name: Remain Calm
description:
This game shows you as someone who was murdered, but in the underworld, you have no recollection of how you died or who you are, so you need to find each clue to find out how you perished, lest you completely forget who you are and become a lost soul, doomed to burn in hell for all eternity.

Controls:

W = Forward

A = Left

S = Backwards

D = Right

Shift =  Sprint

E = Pick Up items
